attributes.action: The Prime Minister should give proper answers at Prime Minister’s Questions.
attributes.background: Prime Minister Keir Starmer consistently refuses to provide full and proper answers at Prime Minister’s Questions. This undermines the democratic process, prevents proper scrutiny of the Government and erodes public trust in our political process.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament as a whole aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Order in the Commons is the responsibility of the Speaker personally, and the Prime Minister is responsible for answers to questions.
